world.title: The World in 2200 - Legacy of the Two Braziers

timeline.2050: First Nuclear War - Collapse of great powers. Nuclear winter, survival in enclaves.
timeline.2100: Second Nuclear War - Race for fuel and water degenerates into global conflict. Vitrified zones.
timeline.2200: The Time of City-States - Bastions of power each controlling a key resource for survival.

environment.deserts: Vitrified nuclear deserts, salt deserts from dried seas, dunes swallowing ruins
environment.fauna: Giant insects, mutant predators, feared packs of wild dogs
environment.flora: Cacti storing radioactive water, carnivorous vines, phosphorescent mushrooms

dailyLife.currency: Fuel, water, food and ammunition are the true currency
dailyLife.machines: Armored vehicles, fortress trains, half-destroyed airships. Engines worshipped as metal gods
dailyLife.society: Slavery, arena fights, public executions. The law of weapons
dailyLife.religion: Cults with absolute faith in machines, diesel engines and reactors

threats.raiders: Organized gangs on fast vehicles attacking convoys
threats.mutants: Deformed humans and animals, rejected or used as slave soldiers
threats.cityStates: Struggle for domination threatening a third world war

politics.balance: Each city-state controls a vital resource → fragile balance
politics.alliances: Temporary alliances and betrayals are common
politics.militias: Serve as police, army and border guards

myths.ancientIsle: The Ancient Isle: an intact paradise, mirage or reality
myths.omegaBunker: Omega Bunker: mythical underground city more advanced than all others

world.essence: A powder keg where heat, radiation, famine and fanaticism reign. Every choice can tip the balance between survival, loyalty and betrayal.
